What is a published scenario in Call of Cthulhu?
A published scenario can be a great source of information about crafting a story into an adventure, as well as providing an insight into how the game can be played.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many players are needed to run a Call of Cthulhu game?
One player, but ideally two or three players together.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many players are needed to join a Call of Cthulhu game?
Two or three players

Where can one ask to join a Call of Cthulhu game?
Local hobby store or by putting a notice up

What can one do if there is no Call of Cthulhu game in their area?

What is a common way to find a group of like-minded people?
Many schools, colleges, and universities have roleplaying societies and groups.

Where can you find gaming conventions?
Gaming conventions come in all shapes and sizes, and they are held all around the world.
